name: 余盛延
objective:
本課程旨在發展學生獨立規劃及從事研究的能力，學生可在指導老師的指導下，依個別的需求選擇研究的方向，訂定題目，並獨立完成研究計畫，撰寫報告。
專題研究範圍含：
實驗研究
量調查研究或質調查研究
個案研究
回溯研究
文化比較研究
理論闡述研究
schedule:
0303  Decide a text for your project.

03/10  Decide a text for your project.

03/17  Preliminary discussion of the primary text

03/24  Preliminary discussion of the primary text

03/31  Find and read secondary texts.

04/07  Find and read secondary texts.

04/14  Find and read secondary texts.

04/21  Find and read secondary texts.

04/28  Find and read secondary texts.

05/05  Find and read secondary texts.Write a summary of the primary text.

05/12  Write a summary of the primary text.

05/19  Submit a summary of the primary text.

05/26  Compile an annotated bibliography for the project (MLA Format).

06/02  Compile an annotated bibliography for the project (MLA Format).

06/09  Analyze a secondary text (MLA Format).

06/16  Analyze a secondary text (MLA Format).

06/23  Analyze a secondary text (MLA Format).

06/30  Submit your critical analysis of a secondary text (MLA Format).
scorePolicy:
Individual conference: 40%
Timely submission of project assignments: 30%
Timely revision: 30%
